title: Smartie
content:
Hello,   
This is my first post at Typophile, I've been lurking for awhile and am glad I finally signed-up.   
I have attempted designing a few typefaces in the past 2-3 years while studying graphic design. I wanted some feedback on this geometric sans I came up with (lowercase only) about 6 months ago.   
Thanks for any critiques...
author: jidoe

comments.content: It would be easier to critique if we had an example to look at =P
